name: 黃如瑩　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective:
本課程的主題聚焦於全球與區域的經貿議題，訓練學生藉由英語之聽說讀寫譯各方面的練習，培養全方位英語表達力，並增進全球視野與區域國際觀。為幫助學生達到更高、更全面的英語力，本課程活動內容包括：英文文章閱讀、英語問答與討論、英語演講與發表、英文心得短文、簡短口筆譯練習。
The first goal of this course is to engage students in the understanding and discussions on the current economic and trading issues on both global and regional scales. The second goal is to cultivate students’ full English skills, including listening, reading, speaking, writing, and interpreting/translating while exploring aforementioned global and regional economic/trading affairs.
